title: How I Became the CEO of a Unicorn
content: Actually, I'm not really sure either. It just voted for me.

title: Should you learn GraphQL? The answer may surprise you.
content: It doesn't surprise you; you should learn it.

title: How to Use GraphQL Fragments in Gatsby
content: I implemented fragments in Gatsby because I hate typing things multiple times. Sure, there's copy and paste, but that is just making the best of bad situation.
